Using the new raw materials I found on Menelaus, I was able to improve my memory once again, especially with regards to Retium, with its special and quite useful properties in signal transport.
回顧我之前的創新,我的改進變得越來越小。看來,以矽為基礎的處理器效能開發已經達到了極致。若想要進一步大幅度的提高其效能,我必須取得一個新的突破。
Info: For general information, see standard memory.
